Package com.fssa.pin.validation

Class FundraiseValidation

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.pin.validation.FundraiseValidation
public class FundraiseValidation extends Object
This class provides methods to validate various aspects of a Fundraise object.

  • Method Details

    • validateFundraise

      public static boolean validateFundraise(Fundraise fundraise) throws InvalidFundraiseException
      Validates a Fundraise object.
      Parameters:
      fundraise - The Fundraise object to be validated.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the Fundraise object is valid, otherwise throws an exception.
      Throws:
      InvalidFundraiseException - If the Fundraise object is not valid.
